body:
Hi all - Thank you so much for the support from the Avicus community!!!  I made a special 100 subs video!!  Please watch since I die multiple times at the end!!!  Thanks again to all the players who helped make the video with me!!  You are awesome!  :)
http://youtu.be/9d9VSBGX2Ig
